#Text=CanadaVOTES : CHP candidate John M. Wierenga running in Yellowhead
#Text=Friday , September 26 , 2008
#Text=On October 14 , 2008 , Canadians will be heading to the polls for the federal election .
#Text=Christian Heritage Party candidate John M. Wierenga is standing for election in the riding of Yellowhead .
#Text=A journeyman welder with a company in Neerlandia , Alberta , John is an active member of the Neerlandia Canadian Reformed Church .
#Text=Serving on his church council , he actively volunteers in the community , serving a partial term on the Pembina Pro-Life Board .
#Text=Wikinews contacted John , to talk about the issues facing Canadians , and what they and their party would do to address them .
#Text=Wikinews is in the process of contacting every candidate , in every riding across the country , no matter their political stripe .
#Text=All interviews are conducted over e-mail , and interviews are published unedited , allowing candidates to impart their full message to our readers , uninterrupted .
#Text=Since 2000 , the riding has been represented by Conservative Rob Merrifield , originally a Canadian Alliance member .
#Text=Besides Wierenga , other challengers for the riding include Melissa Brade ( Canadian Action ) , Mohamed El-Rafih ( Liberal ) , Ken Kuzminski ( NDP ) , and Monika Schaefer ( Green ) .
#Text=For more information , visit the campaign 's official website , listed below .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why are you running for political office , why at the federal level , why this party , and why in this riding ?
#Text=I 'm running for political office because I 'm concerned about the direction our nation is heading .
#Text=We are becoming more and more secular .
#Text=By secular I do n't mean neutral ; secularism is also a religion and it seeks to drive out all other religions from the public square .
#Text=While we 've never been a perfect country , but we were the envy of many and had become a safe haven for many without religious freedoms .
#Text=CHP wants to return to the Judeo-Christian values upon which this nation was founded , which have influence every area of government , from fiscal to moral .
#Text=The Christian Heritage Party is a federal party only .
#Text=The Yellowhead EDA has been my home since birth and wish to represent it .
#Text=Previous to this campaign , have you been politically involved ?
#Text=How will you apply your previous work/volunteer/life experience to serving your constituents ?
#Text=I have run for M.P. in the 2006 election as well and can hopefully built on that experience .
#Text=Locally I have served on a Prolife board and presently serve on our Church Council .
#Text=In these positions commitment to tasks at hand are important as well as service to others .
#Text=As you campaign around your riding , it 's likely that some issues are mentioned more often by voters , than other issues .
#Text=What would you say are the three hottest topics this election , in your riding ?
#Text=1. Global Warming/Environment/Kyoto :
#Text=The CHP would offer real protection for our air and water ; solutions that encourage good , proactive stewardship practices .
#Text=We should not be involved in Kyoto , ' cap and trade ' , ' carbon-credits ' , or in carbon taxes .
#Text=We should increase research into non polluting energy sources .
#Text=Let 's solve the real problems of water , air and soil pollution .

#Text=Panic over so-called climate change , which many scientists say is not man-made , ( scientists often ignored and belittled by mainstream media mind you ) could cripple our economy , cost billions and achieve nothing .
#Text=Instead , let 's promote and reward clean , renewable energy initiatives .
#Text=2. Solutions for the Economy :
#Text=The CHP would put Canada back to work with a nationwide infrastructure stimulus package that would fix our cities , our highways , hospitals and water and sewage treatment plants .
#Text=The CHP would channel dollars to research and development to look after a real environmental threat to our health - man made pollution .
#Text=Eliminate the income tax and implement a ' Fair Tax ' that would boost the economy and put Canadians in charge of the tax they pay .
#Text=3. Healthcare :
#Text=The CHP will overhaul the health care system , improve delivery of services and revamp hospital design for better health outcomes .
#Text=And the Christian Heritage Party is not afraid of private delivery of health care services .
#Text=Neither do we treat entrepreneurship and visionary private-sector leadership as evil when it comes to implementing health care reforms .
#Text=Is there any misconceptions about you , your leader , or your party and platform ?
#Text=One misconception about our party is that we are a one issue party , namely , prolife .

#Text=While true that this proudly sets us apart from every other party in Canada , we do have policies on almost every issue facing Canadians : infrastructure , taxation , healthcare , immigration , debt and deficit .
#Text=For a broader description of these policies - see www . chp . ca
#Text=There 's a more ways than ever to get your message out , from the traditional campaign fliers and lawn signs , to new media like websites , Facebook , and YouTube .
#Text=The tried-and-true routes get the message out to the masses much easier , but digital alternatives are much more measurable in how many are seeing or interacting with your campaign .
#Text=What seems to be the most effective , from your experience ?
#Text=While we tend to continue to use traditional methods to advertise , we understand fully the importance of the new media .
#Text=Mainstream media with their bias tend to ignore our party , we have found it to be extremely essential in getting our message out .
#Text=Today 's youth are turning more and more to these methods of news delivery .
#Text=They are our future !
